channel.title: [DEV]QuarterX Server
channel.description:
I am currently working on my QuarterX Server.
Currently, the Forums, Server, and Website all run off the same SQL database, and the uses the same username and password globally.
Currently what is SQL'd:
[ul][*]Players [*]IP bans [*]Bans [*]Skills [*]Appearance [*]Bank [*]Equipment [*]Friends [*]Ignore [*]Inventory [*]Itemlist [*]NPC [*]Reportlogs [*]Shops [*]Status [*]Timers[/ul]
The website is http://quarterx.org/
I have built the RS website from scratch (sorta), and have the following working:
[ul][*]Bugtracker [*]Changepass [*]Create Account [*]Forums [*]Highscore [*]Knowledge Base [*]News [*]Pmod Center [*]Polls [*]Screenshots [*]Ticketing[/ul]
They are the exact replica of RS's website.
Will be posting more info soon.

item.title: [DEV]QuarterX Server
item.dc:creator: @Emperos Emperos
item.description:
@Emperos wrote:

I am currently working on my QuarterX Server.

Currently, the Forums, Server, and Website all run off the same SQL database, and the uses the same username and password globally.

Currently what is SQL’d:

[ul][]Players
[]IP bans
[]Bans
[]Skills
[]Appearance
[]Bank
[]Equipment
[]Friends
[]Ignore
[]Inventory
[]Itemlist
[]NPC
[]Reportlogs
[]Shops
[]Status
[]Timers[/ul]

The website is http://quarterx.org/

I have built the RS website from scratch (sorta), and have the following working:

[ul][]Bugtracker
[]Changepass
[]Create Account
[]Forums
[]Highscore
[]Knowledge Base
[]News
[]Pmod Center
[]Polls
[]Screenshots
[*]Ticketing[/ul]

They are the exact replica of RS’s website.

Will be posting more info soon.
